Reviews.Content: Horrible place Giotto Park pretends to be a four star-hotel. In reality it has two stars. But who was the inspector for that respectable rating? Maybe a relative of the owner. The hotel is incredibly dirty, it must be years ago that someone vacuumed the floor. Also the sink in the extremely narrow bathroom needs cleaning urgently. The hotel claims to be furnished with antiques. In reality these antiques are only worn-out furniture. I do not recommend this hotel.
Reviews.Author: clausx
